data.title: Ruben Studdard, 'American Idol' Winner Files For Divorce
data.meta_description: 'Idol' Winner Throws In The Towel With Wife
data.text:
According to the Daily Mail, Studdard has filed divorce papers in Alabama citing "irreconcilable differences." The former couple. Studdard's attorney, Byron Perkins stated to the site; "Ruben Studdard and Zuri McCants Studdard have separated, and they are in the process of seeking a dissolution of their marriage. "They each request the public respects their privacy during this trying time in their lives."

The Grammy Award-nominee and McCants dated for two years prior to tying the knot in June 2008 at Caterbury United Methodist Church in Birmingham, Alabama.
